channel.title: 317 Dupe x-log help
channel.description:
Okay, So this is how the dupe is done, i think. You attack a monster click "Save account button" drop the item and xlog, which makes the server restore to the point before you drop the item, which allows you to pick the dropped item and keep the one you had.
Any clue how i could fix this dupe?

item.title: 317 Dupe x-log help
item.dc:creator: @santa_skillz santa skillz
item.description:
@santa_skillz wrote:

any clue how i could stop xlog?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Dupe x-log help
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

  1. Don’t have a save account button.
  2. Look up a guide on how to stop x-loggers.
  3. Make the save button not work in combat
  4. Make a timer when you click the save button on how long before you can drop an item.

Just a few options, some other people may have more

Read full topic
